.. index:: ElementaryFunctionsGeneralizedUnivariatePowerSeries

.. _l456c656d656e7461727946756e6374696f6e7347656e6572616c697a6564556e6976617269617465506f776572536572696573:

ElementaryFunctionsGeneralizedUnivariatePowerSeries(Coef, Expon, PS)
====================================================================

:viewcode:`genser.spad line 1 <genser.spad#L1>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <genser.spad#L1>`

* Coef: \ :ref:`Algebra <l416c6765627261>`\  \ :ref:`Fraction <l4672616374696f6e>`\  \ :ref:`Integer <l496e7465676572>`\ 

* Expon: \ :ref:`OrderedAbelianMonoid <l4f7264657265644162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\ 

* PS: \ :ref:`UnivariatePowerSeriesCategory <l556e6976617269617465506f77657253657269657343617465676f7279>`\ (Coef, Expon) with

    apply_taylor\: (\ :ref:`Stream <l53747265616d>`\  Coef, %) -> %

    removeZeros\: (%, Expon) -> %


Author: Waldek Hebisch
